TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignatureHelper extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._SignatureHelper

summary.span: 提供建置簽章的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for building signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來建立可傳遞至簽章 blob方法類別。Use the class to create a signature blob that can be passed to the method of the class. A物件也可以傳遞至插入 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 資料流中的指令和簽章語彙基元的方法多載。A object can also be passed to the method overload to insert an instruction and a signature token into a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) stream. 如需簽章 blob 和中繼資料簽章的資訊，請參閱 ECMA 分割 II 中繼資料文件。For information on signature blobs and signature metadata, see the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation. > [!NOTE] > 線上; 會提供 ECMA 第二篇文件請參閱[ECMA C# 和 Common Language Infrastructure 標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上並[標準 ECMA-335-通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) Ecma International 網站上。The ECMA Partition II documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

summary.span: 加入引數至簽章。

span.span: Adds an argument to the signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引數會新增至簽章中的項目順序的結尾`arguments`。The arguments are added to the end of the signature, in order of the elements of `arguments`. 請參閱代表自訂修飾詞類別的命名空間。See the namespace for classes that represent custom modifiers.

summary.span: 建立並傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

span.span: Creates and returns a hash code for this instance.
Returns the hash code based on the name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因此傳回的值相同，雜湊程式碼從這個執行個體名稱，建立如同`GetHashCode`方法所呼叫之值的`Name`屬性。The hash code is created from the name of this instance, so the return value is the same as if the `GetHashCode` method were called on the value of the `Name` property.

The object for a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載會建立標準呼叫慣例與簽章。This overload creates a signature with a standard calling convention. 若要建立的自訂修飾詞的方法簽章，使用方法多載，然後使用或加入具有自訂修飾詞的引數的方法多載。To create a method signature with custom modifiers, use the method overload and then use the or method overloads to add arguments with custom modifiers.

summary.span: 加入結尾語彙基元 (Token) 至簽章，並將簽章標記為已完成，如此其他語彙基元便無法再加入。

span.span: Adds the end token to the signature and marks the signature as finished, so no further tokens can be added.

returns.span: 傳回構成完整簽章的位元組陣列。

span.span: Returns a byte array made up of the full signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需詳細資訊`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
